data.title: Popular Hong Kong
data.meta_description: Being rooted in Hong Kong for over 7 decades,  POPULAR has been devoted to providing educational services with the best quality for students in Hong Kong. The main business scope of the Group includes education, publication and relevant retail businesses.
data.text:
Educational Publishing House Limited ("EPH"), which has been incorporated in Hong Kong for more than 60 years, is the key textbook publisher of Popular Holdings Limited (Hong Kong). The textbooks published by EPH are well received in Hong Kong and Macau. These textbooks are aligned with the development and teaching needs in the education industry. EPH also provides all sorts of comprehensive teaching materials and support to pre-school, primary and secondary schools. Furthermore, EPH organises a wide variety of professional teacher trainings, student workshops and other educational activities on a regular basis. It also conducts parentsâ meetings to maintain a close relationship with parents.

WonderKids Publisher (âWonderKidsâ), established in 2015, focuses on the publication of pre-school home education learning materials and books. WonderKids is a subsidiary of Educational Publishing House, Limited, which has decades of experience in publishing school textbooks for kindergarten and primary students. The dedicated publishing team comprises experienced early childhood education experts, and provides high quality educational materials that are specially designed to match the abilities and interests of pre-school children.

Pan Lloyds Publishers Limited consists of 4 major supplementary exercise publishing brands: Pan Lloyds, JumpStart, PopLearn and Smart Parents. With our professional products, we can fulfil the learning needs of children in every developmental stage, and provide comprehensive support to schools and students for self-study. Being recognised as the most reliable and award-winning brand, our products are well received by the industry and parents, and achieve top sales volume every year. (*According to the information about the textbook list (supplementary exercise category) for government, aided and direct subsidy scheme primary schools in Hong Kong for the year 2021/22, schools that adopt the products from Pan Lloyds Publishers Limited was as high as 98%, which accounted for 65% of the market share.)

Seashore Publishing Company (Hong Kong) is one of Hong Kong's best-known publishers of cookbooks. To date, it has published more than 600 titles, with authors ranging from famous artists, head chefs of restaurants and nutritionists to doctors, and even professors. Through their cookbooks, these authors share their valuable experience and knowledge. A series of bilingual cookbooks - English-Chinese and Chinese-Bahasa Indonesia - have turned out to be so popular that they have become an essential reference for many families. Among them, A Cooking Guide for Filipino and Indonesian Domestic Helpers and Master Tang's series of cookbooks have earned outstanding reviews. Recent publications such as the Modern Kitchen series are especially popular with young couples and working adults. In addition to cookbooks, Seashore Hong Kong also publishes books on health, beauty, entertainment and recreation.

Ichiban Book, was established in 2012 to target the trends and interests of youngsters, and mainly publishes popular book series. The pulse of the community as well as hot topics in the city are the focuses of Ichiban Book. These issues showcase the Hong Kong local culture, and at the same time, they enrich the lives of Hong Kong People. Since our establishment, we have collaborated with idols, celebrities, illustrators, scholars and professionals to publish a wide variety of books, which are all well received by readers, including proses, art books, romance novels, language learning, occupational, travel, astrology, photography and pets.
